JOB DESCRIPTION: KEY RESPONSIBILITIES    Work on multiple concurrent development projects utilizing Microsoft SQL Server.   Participate in requirements gathering, testing and production deployments.   Analyse system/application requirements and design innovative solutions.   Design and develop SQL Server database objects (i.e., tables, views, stored procedures, indexes, triggers, constraints, etc.).    Maintain and optimize the existing procedures.    Perform unit and integration testing.    Create technical documentation.    Develop and assist team member.    QUALIFICATIONS    3-7 years of comprehensive Microsoft SQL Server experience working with SQL Server 2005 through 2012.   Graduate(BE/B.Tech)/ Masters(ME/M.Tech/MS/MCA).    In-depth ETL development experience working with Microsoft SQL Integration Services (SSIS), using all areas of the environment, including scripting.    In-depth knowledge of OLAP and Microsoft SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS).   Solid understanding of database design principles.    Strong analytical and technical skills.    Good verbal and written communication skills.      Salary including benefits will be based on prior experience qualifications and will match industry standards.

EDUCATION.UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial
EDUCATION.PG: MCA in Computers, M.Tech in Electronics/Telecommunication
